comments_since_last_sample.body: You work so hard and this came out beautiful! You have changed my mind about flat black I love it! Good job!
Beautiful. Love watching your videos. I’ve learned a lot!
OMGosh! I love that you used the jigsaw on the bottom rather than building a new base. Brilliant idea! I have to try it. This came out so cool 😎 Great job!

Just started following you and I Love the way this piece turned out! I’m about to start a hutch (as soon as my surf prep sander arrives) that I’m also doing like a Pottery Barn piece I found online in a ceruse style finish. I’ve watch Crys’Dawna do a couple of pieces in this finish which is what inspired me to do this solid oak piece in it. It was FREE from my neighbors who moved and didn’t have room for 3 BEAUTIFUL pieces in their new house! Thx for this tutorial!
